languages.text: {n}Голос Высокого фактотума звенит от довольства и гордости.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, ваш приказ исполнен: все готово для проведения вашего небольшого "ритуала" для госпожи Кибеллы! Избранные офицеры верхних палуб готовы покинуть посты, чтобы присутствовать на этом торжественном собрании и выказать почтение Вашей Светлости. Мы готовы начать, когда вам будет угодно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос Высокого Фактотума звенит от довольства и гордости... кажется, за самого себя.{/n} "Лорд-Капитан, приятнейшие известия: все готово для проведения нашего небольшого "ритуала" для госпожи Кибеллы! Ничего сверх обычных расходов, не подумайте, светский раут для офицеров верхних палуб. И мы можем начать немедленно!"

languages.text: {n}The High Factotum's voice rings with pride.{/n} "Lord Captain, I have done as commanded: everything has been prepared for your 'ritual' for Mistress Kibellah! A select few upper deck officers are ready to leave their posts to attend this formal gathering and praise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s name. We can begin at your convenience."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Высокого фактотума звенит от довольства и гордости.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, ваш приказ исполнен: все готово для проведения вашего небольшого "ритуала" для госпожи Кибеллы! A select few upper deck officers are ready to leave their posts to attend this formal gathering and praise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s name. We can begin at your convenience."

{n}The High Factotum's voice rings with pride and satisfaction.{/n} "Lord Captain, I have delightful news! Everything has been prepared for your little 'ritual' for Mistress Kibellah! It was well within our usual expenditure — just a private soiree for upper-deck officers. We can begin at once!"

{n}The High Factotum's voice rings with pride and satisfaction.{/n} "Lord Captain, I have delightful news! Everything has been prepared for your little 'ritual' for Mistress Kibellah! It was well within our usual expenditure — just a private soiree for upper-deck officers. We can begin at once!"

A select few upper deck officers are ready to leave their posts to attend this formal gathering and praise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s name. We can begin at your convenience."

{n}The High Factotum's voice rings with pride.{/n} "Lord Captain, I have done as commanded: everything has been prepared for your 'ritual' for Mistress Kibellah! A select few upper deck officers are ready to leave their posts to attend this formal gathering and praise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s name. We can begin at your convenience."

languages.text: {n}La voz del Sumo Factótum retumba con orgullo.{/n} «Lord Capitán, he hecho lo que me ordenó: ¡todo está listo para el "ritual" de la maestra Kibellah! Un grupo selecto de oficiales de las cubiertas superiores están preparados para dejar sus puestos y formar parte de esta reunión formar en nombre de mil{mf|ord|ady}. Podemos empezar cuando usted quiera».
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum's voice rings with pride.{/n} "Lord Captain, I have done as commanded: everything has been prepared for your 'ritual' for Mistress Kibellah! A select few upper deck officers are ready to leave their posts to attend this formal gathering and praise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s name. We can begin at your convenience."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del Sumo Factótum retumba con orgullo.{/n} «Lord Capitán, he hecho lo que me ordenó: ¡todo está lista para el "ritual" de la maestra Kibellah! Un grupo selecto de oficiales de las cubiertas superiores están preparados para dejar sus puestos y formar parte de esta reunión formar en nombre de mil{mf|ord|ady}. Podemos empezar cuando usted quiera».

languages.text: {n}ハイ・ファクトタムの声が誇らしげに響く。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、すべてご命令通りに終わらせております。キベラ様のためのささやかな『儀式』の準備がすべて整いました！選ばれし少数上層デッキ士官たちが、陛下の御名を称えるべく、持ち場を離れる準備ができております。ご準備が出来次第、始められますよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum's voice rings with pride.{/n} "Lord Captain, I have done as commanded: everything has been prepared for your 'ritual' for Mistress Kibellah! A select few upper deck officers are ready to leave their posts to attend this formal gathering and praise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s name. We can begin at your convenience."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハイ・ファクトタムの声が誇らしげに響く。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、すべてご命令通りに終わらせております。キベラ様のためのささやかな『儀式』の準備がすべて整いました！選ばれし少数上層デッキ士官たちが、陛下の御名を称えるべく、持ち場を離れる準備ができております。ご準備が出来次第、始められますよ」

languages.text: {n}高阶顾问充满自豪的声音响了起来。{/n}“舰长大人，已经按照您的命令准备好了，您为绮贝菈女士准备的‘仪式’已经安排妥当！受到邀请的上层军官可以随时离开他们的岗位，参加这场正式的聚会，赞颂您的圣名。您觉得什么时候方便，我们就什么时候开始。”
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum's voice rings with pride.{/n} "Lord Captain, I have done as commanded: everything has been prepared for your 'ritual' for Mistress Kibellah! A select few upper deck officers are ready to leave their posts to attend this formal gathering and praise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s name. We can begin at your convenience."

traits.locale_text: {n}高阶顾问充满自豪的声音响了起来。{/n}“舰长大人，已经按照您的命令准备好了，您为绮贝菈女士准备的‘仪式’已经安排妥当！受到邀请的上层军官可以随时离开他们的岗位，参加这场正式的聚会，赞颂您的圣名。您觉得什么时候方便，我们就什么时候开始。”

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme der Hoch-Faktotums ist mit Stolz erfüllt.{/n} "Lord Captain, ich habe getan, was Ihr mir aufgetragen habt: Alles ist bereit für Euer Ritual mit Meisterin Kibellah! Einige ausgewählte Oberdeck-Offiziere sind bereit, ihre Posten zu verlassen, um dieser formellen Zusammenkunft beizuwohnen und den Namen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu preisen. Wir können jederzeit beginnen."
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum's voice rings with pride.{/n} "Lord Captain, I have done as commanded: everything has been prepared for your 'ritual' for Mistress Kibellah! A select few upper deck officers are ready to leave their posts to attend this formal gathering and praise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s name. We can begin at your convenience."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme der Hoch-Faktotums ist mit Stolz erfüllt.{/n} "Lord Captain, ich habe getan, was Ihr mir aufgetragen habt: Alles ist bereit für Euer Ritual mit Meisterin Kibellah! Einige ausgewählte Oberdeck-Offiziere sind bereit, ihre Posten zu verlassen, um dieser formellen Zusammenkunft beizuwohnen und den Namen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu preisen. Wir können jederzeit beginnen."

languages.text: {n}La voix du factotum est empreinte de fierté.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il en a été fait selon votre volonté : tout est fin prêt pour votre "rituel" à l'attention de maîtresse Kibellah ! Une poignée d'officiers des ponts supérieurs triés sur le volet se tiennent prêts à quitter leurs postes pour assister à la réception et louer le nom de Votre Seigneurie. Vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire, et nous donnerons le coup d'envoi des réjouissances. »
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum's voice rings with pride.{/n} "Lord Captain, I have done as commanded: everything has been prepared for your 'ritual' for Mistress Kibellah! A select few upper deck officers are ready to leave their posts to attend this formal gathering and praise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s name. We can begin at your convenience."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du factotum est empreinte de fierté.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il en a été fait selon votre volonté : tout est fin prêt pour votre "rituel" à l'attention de maîtresse Kibellah ! Une poignée d'officiers des ponts supérieurs triés sur le volet se tiennent prêts à quitter leurs postes pour assister à la réception et louer le nom de Votre Seigneurie. Vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire, et nous donnerons le coup d'envoi des réjouissances. »

languages.text: {n}Arşıkâhya'nın sesi gururla yankılanıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, emrinizi yerine getirdim. Kibellah Hanım adına düzenlediğiniz 'ayin' için her şey tamam! Titizlikle seçtiğimiz birkaç üst güverte subayı, resmî davete katılıp {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne şükürlerini sunmak üzere görev başından ayrılmaya hazır. Uygun gördüğünüz an başlayabiliriz."
languages.original_text: {n}The High Factotum's voice rings with pride.{/n} "Lord Captain, I have done as commanded: everything has been prepared for your 'ritual' for Mistress Kibellah! A select few upper deck officers are ready to leave their posts to attend this formal gathering and praise Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s name. We can begin at your convenience."
